item.title: By: Aboobacker M K

item.description: Updates snippet to match current syntax, cocurrent-edge is an unstable api and can change at any time. Thanks for pointing out

item.title: By: Guido Tarsia
item.dc:creator: Guido Tarsia
item.description: I'm afraid your code didn't work, I got: <pre><code>undefined method `future' for Concurrent:Module (NoMethodError)<pre><code>
item.content:encoded:
I’m afraid your code didn’t work, I got:

undefined method `future' for Concurrent:Module (NoMethodError)
